description: Cocktail is an application development platform that takes the pain out of the development of data-driven Rich Internet Applications (RIA) in Silverlight or WPF Desktop Applications. Cocktail leverages established patterns and approaches, such as MVVM und builds on DevForce 2010 rich data service capabilities.
releaseNotes:
- Refactored FrameworkBootstrapper to support asynchronous bootstrapping tasks.
- Removed implicit fake store initialization from Harness and AuthenticationService.
- Added support for Silverlight 4.
- Added support for DevForce native Silverlight 5 assemblies (DevForce v6.1.5.1)
- Added support for custom MEF catalogs.
   - TempHire uses the InterceptingCatalog from MefContrib to centrally handle EventAggregator subscriptions.
- Converted TempHire to Silverlight 4.
- Minor improvments to TempHire.
- Minor improvments to HappyHour.
- Updated DevForce installer to 6.1.5.1.
title: Cocktail CTP
